name: Possession (itch) (SleepyGary)
description:
Sent by Mlogan to cause mischief and misfortune, play as an unnamed minion wreaking havoc on the denizens of this peaceful land.

Characters

Mlogan:

The evil inhabitant of the Castle of Doom, she commands her Minions to do her bidding or suffer her wrath.

Minion:

The mischief maker Mlogan sends to terrorize the inhabitants of the peaceful mountain village near the Castle of Doom.

Features:

Stealth Gameplay with Rising Difficulty!

Challenging, Non-RPG Game

Possess other people and they do evil things!

Another very short game that is the result of a contest!
